Package polyglot.ast

Interface CallOps

All Superinterfaces:
ExprOps, ProcedureCallOps
All Known Implementing Classes:
Call_c, JL5CallExt, JL8CallExt
public interface CallOps
extends ProcedureCallOps, ExprOps
This interface allows extension delegates both to override and reuse functionality in Call_c.

  • Method Summary

    Type findContainer​(TypeSystem ts, MethodInstance mi)
    Used to find the missing static target of a static method call.

  • Method Details

    • findContainer

      Type findContainer​(TypeSystem ts, MethodInstance mi)
      Used to find the missing static target of a static method call. Should return the container of the method instance.

    • findTargetType

      ReferenceType findTargetType() throws SemanticException
      Throws:
      SemanticException

    • typeCheckNullTarget

      Node typeCheckNullTarget​(TypeChecker tc, java.util.List<Type> argTypes) throws SemanticException
      Typecheck the Call when the target is null. This method finds an appropriate target, and then type checks accordingly.
      Parameters:
      argTypes - list of Types of the arguments
      Throws:
      SemanticException
